Package org.hibernate.bytecode.instrumentation.spi

Package defining bytecode code enhancement (instrumentation) support.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FieldInterceptor
    Contract for field interception handlers.
    LazyPropertyInitializer
    Contract for controlling how lazy properties get initialized.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFieldInterceptor
    Base support for FieldInterceptor implementations.

Package org.hibernate.bytecode.instrumentation.spi Description

Package defining bytecode code enhancement (instrumentation) support. This package should mostly be considered deprecated in favor of org.hibernate.bytecode.enhance
